name: Proximity (jfouk, mrzinch)
description:
Proximity is a half chess half RPG roguelite that tests your planning and hero formation skills! Make your way past 3 regions of different enemies, with your party of heroes, equipping gear and leveling up your skill tree as you go! Consider each fight carefully, and flee if you have to. Whatever it takes to make it to the final boss!

Proximity was made in 7 days by @mrzinch and I from scratch for the 7DRL 2021 challenge.

You can follow me on twitter  @spf_Grey to keep up with development and see my other projects!
